      • getIdFromString

        public static Object getIdFromString(String id,
                     Class entityClass)
        Convert a string to a mapped id type. Example: 
         
 @Id
 private Integer id;
        With string "10" returns a Integer value 10
        Parameters:
        id -
        entityClass -
        Returns:

      • getEntityTableName

        public static String getEntityTableName(Class entity,
                        boolean nameWithSchema)
        Returns a entity table name. Try to get from @Table annotation, if not exsits try to get @Entity, if not exists return class.getSimpleName()
        Parameters:
        entity -
        nameWithSchema - Indicate if name comes with schema. Example: yourShema.tableName
        Returns:

      • getMappedEntities

        public static List<Class> getMappedEntities(javax.persistence.EntityManager entityManager)
        Return mapped entities in EntityManager. Classes are get from ClassMetadata in SessionFactory
        Parameters:
        entityManager -
        Returns:
